attributes.title: Terrible app
attributes.review: This was the worst app I’ve ever downloaded. It spreads false information along with homophobia , xenophobia,racism, and misogyny. I couldn’t imagine a worst app. Please delete 💘

attributes.title: disgusting.
attributes.review: this app is honestly the worst app i have ever used. it kept kicking me out, and it just seems out of date overall. all i wanted to see was our president’s plans for this country, and i got kicked out every 2-3 minutes. it should be removed from the app store.

attributes.title: A DISGRACE
attributes.review: this app is HORRIBLE as soon as i opened it it crashed and i got a whole bunch of pop up ads i accidentally clicked on one and got a VIRUS I HAD TO BUY A NEW PHONE unbelievable

attributes.title: This app is trash
attributes.review: Don’t get this app I think if you even open it you might loose some brain cells

attributes.title: RIP ABBY 2020
attributes.review: This app killed my dog. Poor Abby was looking at the app and*sniff*couldn't handle the toxicity radiating from my phones and died. Pls don’t get this app if you have a pet or a brain.

attributes.title: Awful app
attributes.review: Every time I attempt to open the app, my phone just crashes.
